thread.title: BRIEF-Nokian Tyres buys senior unsecured notes
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Nokian Tyres buys senior unsecured notes

title: BRIEF-Nokian Tyres buys senior unsecured notes
text:
BRIEF-Nokian Tyres buys senior unsecured notes Sept 9 
Sept 9 Nokian Tyres Plc 
* final tender results for the voluntary tender offer relating to its senior unsecured notes 
* aggregate principal amount of notes offered was EUR 62,300,000, or 41.53 percent of all the notes 
* settlement will occur on 14 September Further company coverage: (Helsinki Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
